mapper.update: update OA_AS_CARD set FNAME=#{FNAME}, FCHECKED=#{FCHECKED}, FSPECTYPE=#{FSPECTYPE}, FORIGINVALUE=#{FORIGINVALUE}, FEXTENDSTR2=#{FEXTENDSTR2}, FDUTYPSNNAME=#{FDUTYPSNNAME}, FSTATUSNAME=#{FSTATUSNAME}, FCREATETIME=TO_DATE(#{FCREATETIME},'yyyy-mm-dd'), where FCODE=#{FCODE}
mapper.select: select count(2) as cnt from OA_AS_CARD where FCODE =#{FCODE}
